text: == Events == * March 12 - Wars of the Roses in England - Battle of Losecoat Field: The House of York defeats the House of Lancaster. * July 12 - The Ottomans capture Euboea. * October 3 - Warwick releases Henry VI of England from the Tower of London, and restores him to the throne. == Births == * June 30 - Charles VIII of France (d. 1498) * November 2 - King Edward V of England, one of the princes in the Tower (d. c. 1483)
